scripts.build: yarn run update-version && rm dist/* && yarn run webpack --env production && cp dist/*.js dist/latest.js && yarn run external
scripts.build:staging: rm dist/* && yarn run webpack --env staging && cp dist/*.js dist/latest.js && yarn run external
scripts.start: rm dist/* && yarn run webpack --env development && yarn run external && webpack-dev-server --env development
scripts.upload: aws s3 sync --acl public-read --profile tweeker dist/ s3://tweeker-embed
scripts.upload:staging: aws s3 sync --acl public-read --profile tweeker dist/ s3://tweeker-embed-staging
scripts.deploy: yarn build && yarn upload && yarn invalidate
scripts.deploy:staging: yarn build:staging && yarn upload:staging && yarn invalidate:staging
